text: György Bálint (28 July 1919 - 21 June 2020) was a Hungarian politician and horticulturist. He was born in Gyöngyös, Hungary. He was a member of the Alliance of Free Democrats from 1994 until 2009. He was a member of the National Assembly from 28 June 1994 through 17 June 1998. Bálint died at his home on 21 June 2020 from heart failure and COVID-19 in Budapest, aged 100.Meghalt Bálint gazda ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Budapest Category:Hungarian centenarians Category:Hungarian politicians
title: György Bálint
